Diogenes Protocol

Trust procedure, not promises.

Airline: Ticketing mismatch / “reprotected but not ticketed” (Starter)

Subject: Urgent — Denied Boarding Due to Ticketing/Confirmation Mismatch — [PNR] — [Date]

To: [Airline Airport Support / Customer Relations]

Booking reference (PNR): [PNR] Ticket number(s): [ETKT] Passenger: [Name] Airport: [Code] Flight: [Number] Date/time: [UTC timestamp]

At the airport I was denied boarding because the reservation/status shown to staff did not match the ticket/confirmation state.

Please provide in writing: 1) the segment status and ticket coupon status at the time of denial, 2) what corrective action was taken (reissue/revalidation/endorsement), 3) a copy of the re-accommodation history (PNR history) for this disruption.

Attached: [screenshots / boarding pass / staff notes if any]

Regards, [Name]
